
The CEO signed a secret with RSA and a low e for speed. Can you forge a message from the intercepted signature? Ciphertext: 0x798e1ea9e5bfe63b3c566df24b775785e9321da5766c84827b30e303939934f502c6dd3f92584c9ebb2c9ef1e1e3a907ce9e8b2f29c2b7236916828f288a2c83


Public Key (n, e): (6886719793484184192120718694788011581128169644390349941509472754861201460388215369680318156650374021380453630319558299363164158670597440585055339829605399, 3)

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{yiupdzfc}
ciphertext: 0x798e1ea9e5bfe63b3c566df24b775785e9321da5766c84827b30e303939934f502c6dd3f92584c9ebb2c9ef1e1e3a907ce9e8b2f29c2b7236916828f288a2c83
cipher: RSA Low-Exponent Signature
hint: What happens when you cube small numbers? Remember e=3!
necessary_info: Public Key (n, e): (6886719793484184192120718694788011581128169644390349941509472754861201460388215369680318156650374021380453630319558299363164158670597440585055339829605399, 3)
subtype: rsa_sign_with_low_public_exponent
archetype: signature_schemes
